title: (x) Lord Elgin - Trajan {minimalista}
content: Anyone with a notion of what this font is? Thanks in advance. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224649im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
author: alfawolph

comments.content: Trajan Regular, more than likely extended in a graphics app
When in doubt, it's usually Trajan.
